name: Blacksquad - Welcome Fortune Box
detailed_description:
Welcome Fortune Box

Welcome Fortune Box is to express gratitude to new and exsiting Black Squad Players.
Redeem and use this awesome item for free.

[Instruction]
- Download the DLC and check your inbox for Welcome Fortune Box
- One Item will be randomly selected from the box

[Welcome Fortune Box Includes]
JAYCE
AK12 BLUE URBAN
MDR BLUE URBAN
BLAZER R93 BLUE URBAN
G17 TIER1 BLUE URBAN
HNK45C BLUE URBAN
NIMRAVUS BLUE URBAN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.4CHZ / AMD Phenom X4 820
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / Radeon HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
